title: bc端连接第3个服务器 用stp连接无法连接
author: hsjwsh

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content:
在BC文件配置里面找到
timeout: 30000
改成尽量大的数或者-1

replies.author: kongkong7
replies.txt_content: 没有截图啥的么   比如配置  链接提示

replies.txt_content:

online_mode: false

  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts: {}
